website_summaries.verdict: The best of both worlds: a quality battery at a budget price.
pros: A reputable, low-cost, deep-cycle battery with exceptional power
cons: Does not come with terminals or terminal hardware

website_summaries.verdict: A first-rate battery for motorcycles and ATVs.
pros: Boasts a 70% longer cycle life compared to conventional deep cycle motorcycle batteries
Proven to perform in extreme temperatures
cons: More expensive than similar motorcycle batteries

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is not a authorized dealer
customer_reviews.text: Called Odyssey on this battery, that is not holding a charge. First they said Amazon is not an authorized dealer. This battery is not working, not holding a charge and no warranty since Amazon is not an authorized dealer. We wasted our money buying it here.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cash

customer_reviews.title: There is soft deception in that the Ad. leads ...
customer_reviews.text: There is soft deception in that the Ad. leads one to believe that the L terminal adapters needs to be purchased separately. This battery, I'm glad I purchased, comes with the L terminal adapters. Not knowing the battery comes with the adapters, to the sellers fault, I bought the optional set. Save your seven dollars and change
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerKAS

customer_reviews.title: Used to be good
customer_reviews.text: Quality has gone way down hill. Used this for my race car. Was religious about always hooking it up to my battery tender. My first one lasted almost 6 years, next one made only 10 months, the next one was toast by 7 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Battery is great caution about Battery Plus
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasted 8 years in my ATV. Ordered new one and it arrived with a cracked corner. Batteries plus say it should be a 2017 battery when its a 2016 battery. Be cautious if the box is even dented, refuse and don't open it. otherwise enjoy your new paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate info - It doesn't fit what it claims to fit
customer_reviews.text: Stated it fit my Harley it does not, we received 2 large snowfalls between receiving and trying to put it in the bike. Once the snow cleared enough to open the door and get to the bike - it did not fit and it is past the time to return it...I don't know what it fits and I don't want to create the same problem for someone else so I can't even sell it.
customer_reviews.author: Car Czar

customer_reviews.title: In warranty process
customer_reviews.text: I am currently dealing with a customer service rep. about my issue. 8/28/18. The battery I received back in April will not hold a charge and has not been reliable. I finally got tired of lack of performance and contacted Odyssey directly. They responded in a very timely manner. I am confident Odyssey will make things right and I can change my overall rating from 1 star to 5.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C. Burge

customer_reviews.title: Performs and lasts as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this battery to replace a previous Odessey battery in my BMW motorcycle (2000 R1100RS). The previous battery lasted 10 years as advertised and never had trouble starting the bike until it finally died. The ABS in BMW motorcycles can fail to engage if the battery is even a little weak so this battery eliminates that problem. Also, Odessey batteries come fully charged with all the necessary hardware so you can install it as soon as it arrives. If you want a battery that performs and lasts then this is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: Is a battery, but nothing like a full size.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice battery at a good price, but it simply does not have the grunt to start a race prepped 2005 M3. All ancillary equipment has been removed. All the battery needs to do is operate the ECU, fuel pump, accessory, and starter. It cannot handle everything at once. With start sequence initiated, the starter solenoid will not activate. I need to deactivate the accessory and fuel pump before it will cycle the solenoid. Once the starter is engaging, I can then turn on accessory and fuel. At this point it will start fine.
customer_reviews.author: RehabGuy

customer_reviews.title: Battery lasted 16 months. No one will honor the 2 year warranty.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this battery in October of 2018. It's not February of 2020 and the battery will no longer hold a charge, despite proper usage and maintenance. I contacted Odyssey with the issue, and they informed me that they will not provide a warranty on batteries sold through "unauthorized mass e-commerce retailers like Amazon.com". That verbiage comes directly from their warranty disclaimer. I wouldn't recommend this battery based solely on the fact that if the battery decides to quite on you prior to the expiration of the warranty period, you will have absolutely no recourse.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T FIT 1997 MAZDA MIATA M EDITION
customer_reviews.text: NOT FOR A MIATA! I’m conflicted in reviewing the battery. It’s a motorcycle battery that’s underpowered for our 1997 Miata M Edition. Otherwise, there’s nothing wrong with it. However, Amazon’s amazing Customer Service came through and rectified the situation after sending them an email detailing the situation.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: I hope nobody bought this POS because of me
customer_reviews.text: OK, I'm back... After one nice loop up thru Oregon and a couple of local rides, the PC680 is totally dead after six months. I revoke my five stars and would caution you against purchasing this battery for your motorcycle. I've had earlier versions that were great but something has gone gunny-bag with these. Don't take my word only - read some of the other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: GSArider

customer_reviews.title: They are NOT what they use to be.
customer_reviews.text: I have used a PC680 in my homebuilt airplane for then years and 1500 hours. ("That's a lot)! My first three pc680's last apprx 3 years each. The last two last barely three months and the last one didn't even make it one month. No, Larry, there is no parasitic drag on the system. I have now gone with an Apex battery. Sorry Odyssey, you used to make a real good PC680. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: 8 years, still going!
customer_reviews.text: You read the title... 8 years and it’s still working. I’m not always good about maintenance. I don’t leave my motorcycle on a trickle charger when it’s not in use for long periods. Even after letting it sit for months and drain down, then charging it.... i’ve done this at least 1/2 dozen times... it’s still running strong. If it died tomorrow I can’t complain. Definitely got my money worth. Original purchase date... Dec 11, 2011... todays date is November 25, 2019
customer_reviews.author: Bret C.

customer_reviews.title: The Battery you get might be years old
customer_reviews.text: Here's my issue. The battery I just received is dated 2016. It's the end of 2020 now. The same brand battery I'm replacing is also dated 2016. You cannot return the battery and there doesn't seem to be an easy way to contact the seller. I went ahead and installed it. Maybe (hopefully) I get years of good service from it. But this sure doesn't give me a warm and fuzzy feeling. Next time I'll buy my battery in person so I can see it's date, OR find a seller that guarantees that they are fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Ken O

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two batteries from this company. The first was great and lasted for 3.5 years in a BMW GS motorcycle. Wanting never to get stuck I purchased another figuring it was nearing the end of its life and I received a new one to find it does not work, will not take a charge, and manufacture date was 2016 even though it is 2020 (my first one purchased in 2017 had a manufacture date of 2017). To make matters worse I cannot return the item because it is a battery. Please do not buy from this vendor or you may lose the entire investment in a new battery :-(.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Brodacki

customer_reviews.title: 2014 BMW K1600GTLE
customer_reviews.text: Battery is about .25" shorter than the factory battery. Easy to shim. A slight twist and both factory cables connect flat, no adapting brackets needed. I received a as advertised new manufacture dated battery. The last one I had over 10 years when I sold the bike with it. It is on a maintainer when not riding. Seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact battery
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 94 Honda Civic, it’s a great battery compact battery about half the size and noticably lighter than the stock battery. And works well with my asp catchcan. Hopefully it last long as i keep it on a special charger for an batteries, since i rarely drive my vehicle. Make sure it fits for your intended use as it cannot be returned to amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Rolon Jr.

customer_reviews.title: WIZZARD OF DARKNESS
customer_reviews.text: Had this battery less than ONE YEAR and no body wants to replace it un any warranty. NOT AMAZON, NOT ODYSSEY, They leave you all alone in the dark. Should be know as the Wizzard of DARKNESS. They leave you in the DARK. Looks like I am going to have to buy ONE more. TEM
customer_reviews.author: T. E.  M.

customer_reviews.title: BMW R1100R, first one lasted 8 years!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this battery! smaller and lighter than the stock for my 2000 oilhead. My first one last 8 years of abuse before I bought a new one. I still have the old one to see how long it will keep its charge...who knows, maybe I could've left it installed for longer! Sure it's more expensive than a lead-acid, but no maintenance, no leaks to worry about (I move the bike with my household goods in a moving truck every 2 years) and it will last twice as long.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Mcconnell

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and still has enough juice
customer_reviews.text: This battery is a staple for track cars. I replaced my E36 M3 battery and my Z4M roadster battery with this Odyssey PC680. These batteries seem to last forever, and have enough juice to start the car every time. Even after sitting several weeks. And the best part is that at 15lbs or whatever, it drops 20-30lbs out of my track cars. Picture shown is my Z4M roadster, removed the original battery and installed this one in a metal frame up against the rear bulkhead. Not only did I save weight but saved room in my trunk area.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Nationwide

customer_reviews.title: Used in RV7 experimental aircraft. Replace every 2 years
customer_reviews.text: This battery is awesome for what it does and the small size it is. However. When subjected to the high stress of extreme temps and the load of starting an aircraft engine, even with a Battery Minder on it, I only get 2 to 2 1/2 years out of one. They will be fine, and the next day, my starter is just buzzing. I've heard this from others also. So... I just put one in every 2 years or so. at $60/year to operate, its cheaper than one jump start on a Sunday morning breakfast run.
customer_reviews.author: T. Reimer

customer_reviews.title: car ran perfectly fine this entire time went to go move the car ...
customer_reviews.text: ordered this its been on my car for 3 months already dead... wont get back to 12volts only registers 6... car ran perfectly fine this entire time went to go move the car out my garage to work on another battery was dead... nothing was left on just completley died..
customer_reviews.author: Darnell jamal gray

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very misleading ad describing these batteries as being deep cycle RV batteries. They are not. Not even close. More like a lawn mower battery. Would never buy again. And they are non-returnable. I never write reviews but this is pure junk and a rip-off so I felt others should know.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Easily Lasts 3-4 Years Minimum
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from Amazon for $120 (after taxes) after buying the same battery from Batteries Plus for $194. Needless to say, I took the other battery back and told them I couldn't justify spending the extra $74. This battery is the "extreme" which has a bit more power in cold weather than the standard Odyssey battery. It fits in my 2009 BMW R1200RT with a slight modification as it isn't tall enough. I have these in all of my bikes. These batteries easily last 3-4 years minimum.
customer_reviews.author: Jaybyrd

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even last a year!
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my BMW cycle. Fit good, was pleased. After 9 months it won't even take a charge!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: KEEP IT CHARGED IN THE WINTER
customer_reviews.text: didn't keep my first one of these charged in the winter, and it was shot after about a month. like completely shot. keep it inside in a closet or something and put a charger on for a while every third week or so. like a nice charger, my battery tender didn't work to charge this, youll have to buy a nice charger with a high amperage for an AGM type battery. apart from that I've had no issues with this battery!
customer_reviews.author: davis gese

customer_reviews.title: Wrong battery
customer_reviews.text: Amazon rates this battery as top seller. I had entered need for direct replacement battery for my Mazda Miata. This battery popped up. It is not a car battery. It is a motorcycle battery and is not returnable. There is no indication as to what motorcycles it fits so I probably won't be able to resell it. I just wasted $138.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for only 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I installed this battery on March 6th and it is dead today June 3rd. I cannot find anyway to contact seller about warranty. These batteries have a good reputation, and I don't know if I got a dud or if the quality has gone down the tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Worst battery, poor longevity, Amazon not an authorized dealer- Dont Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my motorcycle in July 2018. In June 2019 it is dead! I ride several times weekly and always kept it on a trickle charger when not riding. 11 months old and its gone! Called Odyssey and they indicate Amazon is not an authorized retailer so forget the warranty. Don't waste your money here on this battery. Better off buying a Yuasa locally which I've done.
customer_reviews.author: Green Monster

customer_reviews.title: Great battery, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great battery for my Mahindra XTV. Make sure you check the size of the battery you are replacing compared to this one. I can fit two of these in the space my stock one was in. That is what I plan to do when I replace the UTVs second battery to eliminate running lines to the back where the current second battery lives (on a gas XTV where the diesel model has the second battery).
customer_reviews.author: artimis hoke

customer_reviews.title: 2000 BMW R1100RS. After install, the bike fired ...
customer_reviews.text: 2000 BMW R1100RS. After install, the bike fired up stronger and faster than before. Been installed for about 6 months - doesn't have same strength but still does well. Cranked up in 18 degree weather this morning without an issue and having sat for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was very impressed by this battery
customer_reviews.text: Finally got around to reviewing this battery after a year. Worked like a champ in my 98 vmax last summer. I parked the bike mid october last year and finally got around to trying to start today, 5 1/2 months later and expected the battery to be dead. It was super cold this winter in Indiana, got down to like -15 a couple days. Plus, the bike is carbureted and had gas sitting in the carb all winter. I walked out to the garage with low expectations and was shocked when i hit the starter and heard it fire up right away and sounded like i just parked it yesterday. This battery is a beast
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware!!
customer_reviews.text: Battery was not new. At less than one year, it went dead. Took it to battery shop to check it. Was dead. Thought I had a 2 year warranty, but was told it was made in 2016. I bought it in 2018 thinking I was purchasing a new battery. The battery was over the 2 year warranty. Hard to believe that Amazon sold me an expired battery as new. Won’t trust Amazon on such items again.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Has not worked well for my BMW motorcycle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this battery for my 2006 R1200RT. It's a bit smaller than the existing battery so it required some foam to make it fit tightly. The CCA's worked great during the recent cold snap and it didn't even hesitate starting the bike at 25 degrees (parked outside). UPDATE (Jan. 25, 2017) I had initially given this battery 5 starts after initially using it, but it lasted less than 1 year. Amazon replaced it on warranty, which was great! But the 2nd has only lasted just over 1 year and no longer will start the bike at cold-ish temps (35 degrees) even when on a battery tender. I cannot recommend this battery as a good replacement for the R1200RT.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Dead
customer_reviews.text: Bought brand new and used it for about 30 minutes total attempting to start a vehicle, Battery sat for 6 months and when I went to recharge it, it was dead. Cant get it to hold a charge. Tried multiple different charging units. Contacted rep via email and they were no help with trying to replace via warranty
customer_reviews.author: josh luedemann

customer_reviews.title: STRONG FOR ITS SIZE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT, I USED IT AS SECONDARY BATTERY FOR RUNNING MY AMP PIONEER GM-DX975. BATTERY LAST MORE THAN 3 HOURS LISTENING AT MID VOLUME.FIT WELL BEHIDE THE BACK SEAT OF THE TRUCK. DON'T LIKE: THE BATTERY POST TOO CLOSE TO BATTERY HOLDER THEN I USED ZIP TIES TO HOLD IT
customer_reviews.author: Tammie D.

customer_reviews.title: Fine product but seller must have opened the box and taken the hardware...for resale?
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Odyssey PC680 battery I’ve purchased for my motorcycles and in my opinion the best. The last one that I replaced was eleven years old and was starting to need charging more often but never left me stranded. The actual battery box was sealed with tape in a very messy way which I have never experienced with other purchases of this product. Upon opening the following was missing: “L” brackets and terminal bolts. Reviews stated they were included as I have experienced in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Cap

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for Motorcycle Use
customer_reviews.text: Installed in BMW motorcycle to replace the overpriced and oddly sized OEM original battery. This one lasted just over 4 years, about the same as a typical AGM battery in motorcycle application. So at twice the price of a standard AGM battery, definitely not worth the hype/premium price and will be moving on to alternative AGM battery brand.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my motorcycles and swap them out every couple years just to be on the safe side. I had a question on the date code of my last purchase, called Odyssey's support number and was instantly greeted with a real live human who answered my question in a matter of seconds. That in itself was amazing. I will purchase again just for that level of support.
customer_reviews.author: Arc

customer_reviews.title: Want to get stranded with no warning?
customer_reviews.text: Dead as a doornail after 7 months of trickle charging when not in use. I couldn't even jump my car to get it off the trailer because it would die with jumpers unplugged. I literally had to remove the battery from my daily and swap it in to get my car in the garage. Thanks for nothing, Odyssey! Avoid!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: 13 months
customer_reviews.text: Mine just died after 13 months in my 2010 STI. It will not charge past 4.8v. This is my second vehicle and not a daily driver and it parks in the garage. I drive the car about 3 times (80 miles or so) a week. I am going back to a full size Interstate battery that I can buy locally. Its unfortunate because I can definitely feel the lighter front end on the track.
customer_reviews.author: John F.

customer_reviews.title: Watch who full fills your Amazon order for batteries!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Battery failed after 6 mos,Amazon and seller would not stand behind the item,However the manufacturer will.The process has started with the manufaturer and can take up to 8wks.In the meantime the motorcycle is sitting,sitting,sitting. Merchant. Battery Sales USA
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Weak cranking amps
customer_reviews.text: Gutless, no punch at all. Last AGM I will ever buy
customer_reviews.author: Button Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Light, small, and powerful.
customer_reviews.text: This little battery has enough power to start my 350 LT1 Chevy V8, although I do have a gear reduction starter which certainly helps. I had one of these in an airplane that seldom flew. The battery would hold a charge for 6 months or more without a problem and the weight savings compared to a regular full size battery is substantial.
customer_reviews.author: John A Hartman

customer_reviews.title: It started the like a champ until this 4th week of May 2018
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new Odessey PC680 for my 2002 VMax 1200 two years ago. Battery is stamped 2016. It started the bike a champ until this 4th week of May 2018. Took the bike off of the C-tek charger and it started a few times, then quit and then didn't have the juice to turn the motor over. After changing the stator, regulator/rectifier and checking all connections the battery was recharged and started a few times then died again. Tests show that the battery was not holding enough charge to run the bike. 2 years it lasted. The Yuasa that was in there before lasted 5.
customer_reviews.author: Foreskin Boy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT aftermarket option for your motorcycle
customer_reviews.text: These are great batteries. This little guy cranks over my old Honda reliably every time. I had one on my Harley for 5 years without any sort of winter maintenance and it still worked pretty good. Can't say that for any other motorcycle batteries I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly in my 2001 BMW R1100RT
customer_reviews.text: This battery fits my 2001 BMW R1100RT perfectly. Bike starts right up, headlights are bright and it has enough amps to power the ABS system. Overall great battery.
customer_reviews.author: anthony seran

customer_reviews.title: "L" Terminal Adapters Included - K1200RS  '03
customer_reviews.text: 2003 K1200RS The "L" Terminal Adapters were included with the battery. I did not have to buy the "L" Terminal Adapters. The battery was in it's original packaging. Upon opening the top of the box, there were the "L" Terminal Adapters, in a small plastic bag, on top of the battery. My battery was sold by Amazon. Amazon apparently stocks these batteries. The battery fits like a glove, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Always Skeptical

customer_reviews.title: Excellent battery
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a 12 year old PC680 in my Laverda 668 Sport Bike. Almost exactly the same. Excellent battery, no complaints. The addition of the right angle adapters was a great improvement. Yes, I would buy again and would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Just an Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a motorcycle.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a full-size battery. It appears to be the size of a motorcycle battery.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Wiersma

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: It is advertised as a deep cycle battery..... I was expecting a full size battery..... I guess I am old school,,, but this battery will not run all the expected duties for an RV It will not last to run stabilizer jacks,,, frig..... slide outs and lights. I’m sure it’s a good battery..... but need to be more clear on the size in descriptions.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for a Dynalite XP1100
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this battery for a Dynalite XP1100 charge system used for professional photography lighting power supplies. The battery fit the unit, all terminals also fit correctly & it took a full charge. I can’t comment on longevity yet but it appears to be a well built battery.
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore Dovi

customer_reviews.title: These things really last!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these in my airplane (Van's RV-9A) for NINE years and replaced it just because it was old. Used in in a garden tractor for another three before it gave out. I am going to replace my car battery with an Odyssey!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not doing this again
customer_reviews.text: Failed after two weeks and 500 miles of use, stranding me 180 miles from my destination and requiring a $300 u haul rental to get where I was going. Collateral damage to my motorcycle included a blown electronic control module, tachometer and headlight. You can see in the picture where the back is swollen and distorted.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Sample

customer_reviews.title: I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Odyssey battery for my 2000 R1150GS. The first one lasted seven years and I’m hoping this one does the same. Instillation was easy and since battery was delivered fully charged, my motorcycle fired right up.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Shapley

customer_reviews.title: Dead before it was used.
customer_reviews.text: Connected battery, used bike twice plugged to tinder. Fast forward 6 months try to crank the bike and battery is shot. Not what I expect out of 126$.
customer_reviews.author: D. Melton

customer_reviews.title: Un-returnable
customer_reviews.text: This battery does not fit a Dodge Caravan as listed, and it is un-returnable. Looks like it might fit a moped, and now I'm stuck with something I can't return and can't dispose of.
customer_reviews.author: J. H. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY replacement battery I'll buy
customer_reviews.text: Odyssey batteries seem to last TWICE as long as the over-priced OEM gel batteries from BMW. Plus, you get plenty of warning when they're starting to wear out. The BMW batteries crank strong and hard until suddenly they don't... usually when you're MILES from home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shallow Water Craft Please read this!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect battery for main or back up for trolling. If your type of boat is not really made for the standard trolling/marine battery here is the answer. This battery works better than you would believe. Read the data sheet and know it tells the truth, not hype.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong
customer_reviews.text: Had this battery for over a year now and it has seen -50 degrees and some really cold winter days here in MN. Couldn't get vehicles of mine started due to the cold but my Side By Side started right up in -30 degrees with this battery installed. Had plenty of cold cranking amps to turn over the motor. The battery also powers my 32" light bar, bluetooth speaker, 3" pod in the bed and the stock headlights.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Stephen Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Buy from an authorized dealer
customer_reviews.text: Used for 3 months now it won't hold a charge and only has 5cca. Now trying to apply for a warranty but it's a slow process
customer_reviews.author: THE ZEF

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely bad experience... this thing lasted about 8 months... dont waste your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: JaLeel H. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but Powerful.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is small, but works awesome. Fits nice and snug in the RSX engine bay instead of the big beefy normal 25lbs 12V battery. You will need to either have a custom battery tray made, or you can buy the PWJDM "relocator" kit. However, if you own the "Auto" trans RSX the relocator will not fit/ Trust me I own a auto and tried it does not fit in like on the 5-6spd. I custom fit my relocator in however with some ingenuity.
customer_reviews.author: DJB

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last a year
customer_reviews.text: Maybe the one that I received was defective, but it ended up completely dead in less than a year. Before it died, it worked well, and did everything you would expect a battery to do. Additionally, it is very light weight, making it ideal for racing applications.
customer_reviews.author: Rob P

customer_reviews.title: Old stock? Battery has come up dead twice-
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what’s the issue with this battery. I’ve used odyssey batteries in my BMWs for years with no trouble, usually last 6 years, but this battery is still in its first season and I’ve jump started the bike twice. Might be looking for warranty on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ketel 1

customer_reviews.title: Came Broken
customer_reviews.text: Product came broken,trying to return or get money back,but there is no answer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The $13.00 right angle adapters come with the battery. Not in the description. Could have saved $
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be well made battery. Fit was good. I wish the description said that it came with the right angle adapters so I didn't waste $13 ordering them separately. Time will tell if it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Orygunian

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old date code.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given 5 star except that the date code on battery was 2016. I bought it well into 2020. I feel like I was sold old stock. And at this point I don't know how much that hurt. Battery is also a little shorter than my stock battery so I had to shim it so that rubber retainer strap would hold it tight in my BMW 1150gs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for your Beemer - or one of those other brands :D
customer_reviews.text: The Odyssey PC680 is top rated by riders for a reason, and is still best by far - installed this in August, we got an early snow in October and I parked my baby in the garage - and forgot to plug in the tender! - Temps dropping to single digits for long stretches for the past five months, just turned her over without a hiccup - killer battery and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rogan

customer_reviews.title: Amazon refuses to honor warranty
customer_reviews.text: I recommend NOT buying this battery from Amazon as they DO NOT HONOR THE WARRANTY. After about a year, the battery would not hold a charge very well. And now at this point will not take a charge at all. Still within the warranty period, and Amazon says they cannot help me - that I have to contact the manufacturer. The manufacturer says I have to contact the seller which is Amazon. So I guess I’m just out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: K. DiMattia

customer_reviews.title: Great battery
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new battery for our home generator. The original battery was a full size car battery and it's very hard to get out or replace. So this battery fits in so easy and works perfectly. I'm very pleased I got one.
customer_reviews.author: Tentime

customer_reviews.title: Replaced battery in my BMW RT1100
customer_reviews.text: Just slightly taller that the battery I was replacing. Includes several bolts and terminal extensions for easy fitment
customer_reviews.author: Glenn A. Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Power, size
customer_reviews.text: The 2 Odysseys Extremes I put in my 2002 Class A Gulf Stream RV filled all of my needs and wants.I use them as the house batteries, and despite their light weight and small size, they deliver all the power I need and recharge quickly. I did my research, bought them, and can honestly say they deliver all they claim!
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Collins

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Odyssey PC680 about a year ago. Stopped holding a charge a couple of weeks ago. The battery has been very lightly used and has always been kept on a BatteryMINDer Model 2012-AGM since new.
customer_reviews.author: Harold L Cole

customer_reviews.title: always a good battery
customer_reviews.text: always the battery to go too for motorcycles. Keep a maintainer on it and it should last 5 yrs or more.
customer_reviews.author: wgr

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Lasted one year, always had it on a battery tender Won’t hold a charge. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: physgraffi

customer_reviews.title: Direct Fit For 1996 R1100RT
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a champ and did not have to modify battery compartment on bike.
customer_reviews.author: John Bentley

customer_reviews.title: It's not always how much you pay
customer_reviews.text: My last offset battery last 10 years! This one has failed in two. Very disappointed. Won't be buying another one of these. A bell is half the price and you can count on four years.
customer_reviews.author: susan wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement For The DynaLite XP1100
customer_reviews.text: The DynaLite XP1100 is a location AC SINE power source. Used mostly by photographers and this is the replacement battery. Works just fine
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy L. Dubrul

customer_reviews.title: ... (which was a day early) and I couldn't be happier! I purchased a post adaptor kit and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it installed the same day that it came in (which was a day early) and I couldn't be happier! I purchased a post adaptor kit and I wish I hadn't because this battery comes with L brackets that would work just fine instead. I'm very happy with how small and powerful the battery is. Im hoping it lasts a good amount of time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power
customer_reviews.text: Installed this in a BMW K1600 GTL with the original 2013 battery. The cranking was getting a little slow on the original, but now it starts immediately with no hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: JimF

customer_reviews.title: Great battery for motorcycles.
customer_reviews.text: Installed in a 2005 BMW R1200RT. Pre-charged AGM battery with plenty of cranking amps to throw over the bike's flat/boxer twin, what's not to like? Mine came with the L brackets that are recommended for the BMW, but I've found that they're not necessary. Since the Odyssey is slightly smaller than the factory battery, the fit is a little on the loose side vertically, but it's nothing a minor amount of shimming doesn't fix. Overall, a solid value. Search around on BMW forums if you need more evidence.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Dubya

customer_reviews.title: Works great and it comes with L Terminals already.
customer_reviews.text: It's a really small and lightweight battery. Great for track or weekend use. This item already comes with the L Terminals already so no need to buy a set like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: 7 years on the first, so why not another?
customer_reviews.text: Hard to beat for the price. First one on my 09 BMW R1200RT lasted 7 years with minimal time on the charger during winter, so I got another. It would still charge and start but didn’t hold more than two days if I didn’t ride. For a battery of this size, I’d call that awesome performance.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Creech

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic battery, but know what you’re buying
customer_reviews.text: Small, light, odyssey. However don’t let it die, or it won’t come back. No warranty if you let it die all the way either!
customer_reviews.author: Stephan

customer_reviews.title: Unit does what the manufacturer says
customer_reviews.text: I found this unit worked for me. I would recommend this unit to my family friends and buyers
customer_reviews.author: J.K. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: only batt to use
customer_reviews.text: I have a BMW r1100 g/s and this is the only battery I would use in it. Works real well and stays charged on a smart charger all winter. Well, except for the night last Fall when the temp. dropped 70 degrees overnight. Yes it really did. Killed all kind of trees all over town and the Odyssey batt. wasn't quite up to the shock. Neither was the conventional wet lead-acid batt. in my KLR bike.
customer_reviews.author: D.B. Rea

customer_reviews.title: Battery good, Amazon did not ship terminals with it
customer_reviews.text: This may have been my fault but I assumed from the pictures on the offer that it would be coming with terminals which it did not.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie KD

customer_reviews.title: Comes with adapters.
customer_reviews.text: Just installed the PC680-P in my 2003 BMW r1150 rt. The battery shipped with the L adapter kit with bolts, so I had everything I needed. Installed fine. Bike roared to life (after I figured out how to kill the alarm that automatically reset to on when the original battery was removed). Hope the battery lasts for several years, because taking the left side of the fairing off to install a battery in the r1150 rt (a battery installation requirement) takes a couple of hours. Found directions online...so no problems.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: The battery wend bad after only a year and a half
customer_reviews.text: This battery is very light and compact which is nice but it has a terrible life span and frequently would need a jump after only sitting for a few days. Not a good mini battery for a car.
customer_reviews.author: Kelson

customer_reviews.text: Really nice st up for my focus rs but the battery dies a lot
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Have used these before and they do very well. Used in a small airplane.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Battery Swell
customer_reviews.text: This battery is a little over 4 months old and the sides have began to bulge. There is only a 90-day window to return the battery, so I wonder if they are aware of the problem. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Died after a few uses...... It is in an antique and not abused.
customer_reviews.text: Installed in a1999 Mazda MX5. Easy to do and was smaller and lighter than original battery. UPDATE: July 22, 2018 Battery dead (second time) not taking a charge! I need a replacement!
customer_reviews.author: W3BY

customer_reviews.title: Great battery for the money
customer_reviews.text: First one was 7 years in my BMW motorcycle and only reason replacing now is to assure I have no problems while traveling but will use the removed battery in other places I use 12 volt batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery for my 2004 K1200GT
customer_reviews.text: Came in a double box with the "L" posts included. Fit the battery compartment just fine, although I had to angle the battery forward to get the positive wire on due to the Canister being in the way. No shims or anything extra needed. Much cheaper than OEM and works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Deathgripsugar

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 4 days
customer_reviews.text: Had one of these for 10 years and it finally failed. Bought a new one from Amazon and after four days it died and won't take a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Pichon

customer_reviews.title: Too early to rate.
customer_reviews.text: I read good reviews on a motorcycle forum, Since it's only been in my moyorcycle a month it's too early to rate it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description - DO NOT ORDER FOR RV USE
customer_reviews.text: not for use with an RV as described, not returnable. EXTREMELY disappointed I can't get my money back as it will not work for our RV application as described BOGUS!
customer_reviews.author: B. R.

customer_reviews.title: I like it because it's slimmer and lighter than my old ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 1990 BMW R100RT. I like it because it's slimmer and lighter than my old battery. Has been holding up for about 6 months without any need for re-charging (naturally). I only ride about 20 miles a day for commute though. I do remove the negative terminal when storing for a long time (I didn't ride for a month). Will buy again if current one dies.
customer_reviews.author: mdesu

product_meta.title: Odyssey PC680 Battery
product_meta.description: ODYSSEY Batteries Powersports Battery features a rugged construction, built to take the constant pounding that comes with the territory, whether that territory is on land, sea, or snow. The ODYSSEY battery can handle it. Packed tightly with pure lead plates, the non-spillable AGM design ODYSSEY battery protects against the shock and vibration that can quickly destroy other batteries. And the pure lead plates mean more power— twice the overall power and three times the life of conventional batteries— up to 400 cycles at 80 percentage depth of discharge. The ODYSSEY battery is the ideal choice for a complete range of powersports applications: Motorcycles, ATVs, personal watercraft, snowmobiles, ultralight aircraft and Gyrocopter aircraft. Its construction consists of pure virgin lead plates for maximum surface area and optimized recycling, AGM (absorbed glass mat) design that eliminates acid spills, high conductivity, corrosion-resistant tin-plated brass terminals, high integrity terminal seal, a sealed design resulting in gases recycled internally during operation or charging, a safety relief valve per cell and robust intercell connections to prevent vibration damage. ODYSSEY batteries beat spiral-wound. Compared to spiral-wound batteries of equal size, ODYSSEY batteries pack 15 percentage more plate surface area into the case. Avoiding the dead space between cylinders in six-pack designs means ODYSSEY batteries deliver more power and 40 percentage more reserve capacity. Pulse (5-second) Hot Cranking Amps (PHCA): 520.
feature_bullets: 170 CCA; Better warranty: Limited 2-year full replacement warranty, not pro rata; Longer service life: With 3-10 years of service life, ODYSSEY batteries save consumers time, money, and aggravation
Longer cycle life: 70 percentage longer cycle life compared to conventional deep cycle batteries, up to 400 cycles at 80 percentage depth of discharge- high stable voltage for longer periods of time
Faster recharge: The highest recharge efficiency of any sealed lead battery on the market, capable of 100 percentage recharge in 4 - 6 hours; Mounting flexibility: Non-spillable design
Vibration resistance- design protects against high impact shock and mechanical vibration; Extreme temperature tolerant
This item is not for sale in Catalina Island
